pair.title: Add Shelly device
pair.nosettings: Please fill in all the required fields.
pair.intro: Enter the IP address and, if configured, your username and password for your Shelly device.
pair.intro-relay: Pair your Shelly2(.5) device as a device with two relay buttons (this can be configured in the Shelly smartphone app). Enter the IP address and, if configured, your username and password for your Shelly 2 device.
pair.intro-rollershutter: Pair your Shelly2(.5) device as a device with two roller shuttter buttons (this can be configured in the Shelly smartphone app). Enter the IP address and, if configured, your username and password for your Shelly 2 device.
pair.testing: Connection test succesfull, you can now connect the Shelly device.
pair.startpairing: First pair the device with the Shelly smartphone app. Then press the physical button on your Shelly sensor or remove and re-insert the battery to wake up the device. The LED inside the sensor stops blinking once it has connected to your WiFi and is then ready for pairing. Then you can click the next button below.
pair.startpairingbutton: First pair the device with the Shelly smartphone app. Connect a USB cable to the button to ensure it's powered and connected with your WiFi before continuing.
pair.startpairingmotion: First pair the device with the Shelly smartphone app. Enable the CoAP communication through the webinterface of your Shelly Motion Sensor. From the webinterface reboot your Shelly Motion and continu this pairing wizard directly after the sensor has rebooted.
pair.titleselection: What do you want to do?
pair.nodevices: No devices have been discovered. You can try again or use manual pairing if you know the IP address of your Shelly device.
pair.intro_upload: If you wish to use a custom icon for your device you can upload it here. The icon needs to be in .svg format.
pair.intro_vintage_icon: Select which icon you want to use for your Shelly Vintage.

util.401: Error 401: user credentials are missing or this user is not authorized, make sure you have copied the correct user credentials as entered in the Shelly smartphone app or Webinterface.
util.502: Timeout error: make sure you have entered the correct IP address and that the Shelly device is online.
util.unknownerror: Unknown error, are you sure you have entered the correct IP address and Homey is on the same network as the Shelly device? Please check your settings and try again.

connect.intro: Using the Shelly RGBW2 in CW/WW mode enables you to connect 2 LED strips as follows:
connect.single: If you only attach one LED strip or you want to always keep the two channels in sync, you should check 'Use as single device'.
connect.device-type: Set the Device Type in the Shelly app to 'Color'
connect.strip1: Strip 1: CW pin to R terminal, WW pin to G terminal
connect.strip2: Strip 2: CW pin to B terminal, WW pin to W terminal
connect.warning: With this setup, controlling the LED strips with the Shelly apps is not practical.

driver.wrongdevice: The Shelly device you are trying to pair does not match with the selected Shelly device in the pairing wizard.
